attributes.action: Reduce politicians wages, to 30k a year.
attributes.additional_details:
The rise of inflation and constant problems that government have failed to fix year after year, needs to be addressed. Help the UK become a half decent country again there wages can pay for more public services that we massive lack in all areas.

Police have no authority over anything these days.
The NHS is crumbling to its knees because poor working conditions.

This doesn't seem to bother politicians because they are not working class individuals.
attributes.background:
Reduce there own wages, they have been doing a poor job for years.
The money that they make is appalling.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

https://www.theipsa.org.uk/contact-us
